title: Toy gun with soft bullets,Foam Blasters,toy gun for Boys with ejectable magazine-1:1 size toy gun with magazine for safety training or play,unique gift-golden
features: Soft Bullet Toy Gun for Kids — Our toy guns are designed for kids with their safety in mind. Includes 10 soft bullets and a case containing 8 of them. soft bullets are fired in a close range of 10 meters with impact. Suitable for children from 7 years.

Kids design - These soft foam darts are shot out like the sound of the toy guns, but actually the darts are soft and harmless. Even if child accidentally shoots a dart in the wrong direction, it will not hurt anyone. Perfect design and suitable for children aged 7 and above to play.

IMPORTANT: The slide of the toy must be fully retracted and only once per shot to avoid damage. Do not load more than 6 rounds in may.Great for teaching safety and respect. Load the magazine, pull the slide back to the room one lap and pull the trigger to release a rubber bullet. Bullet travels just a few feet for safety. The pleasure of this toy is the of its mechanics

Unique Gift :Toy gun with soft bullets,1:1 size toy gun with magazine for safety training or play,Removable magazine, spring loaded slide action with great sound and magazine release button,This is a great gift for children for birthdays, parties, Halloween, and Christmas
description: Product description Features: ** 1:1 Size that gives you a very feel. **Mechanical Magazine & Smooth Replenishment: Manual reloading, each bullet needs to be manually reloaded and the bottom magazine needs to be reloaded automatically. ** The soft bomb specially designed for children is soft and does not cause any harm to the human body, so you can play with peace of mind. ** Fun Outdoor Activities: Like adult shooting paintball, shooting is a fun, challenging and positive experience for children, which involves exercise, aiming skills, observation and endurance. Specification: Size: 28cm/12'' Total Quantity: About 350g Material: ABS Material Range: About 10 Meters Mode: manual single shot Appropriate age: 7 years or older. Feature Introduction: Competition, Manual Safety Warning Please do not face your eyes directly during use,Not suitable for children under 3 years old
